You are registered for Write Like the Best Legal Writers* with Adjunct Writing Professor, David Kemp on Friday, February 3, 2023 at 11:00 a.m. PT. Review the agenda here and don’t forget to mark your calendar for this can’t-miss presentation!

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

Don’t miss our upcoming Justia Webinar presentation: Write Like the Best Legal Writers* At 11:00 am PT, Rutgers Law and UC Berkeley Law Adjunct Professor David Kemp will discuss how lawyers can improve their legal writing skills and why writing matters in the practice of law.

message: You are in the final hours to register for our next Justia Webinar, Write Like the Best Legal Writers* on February 3, 2023! Attendees will enhance their legal writing skills by exploring the craft of legal writing with Rutgers Law and UC Berkeley Law Adjunct Professor David Kemp.
bottomline: Act Now Before It Is Too Late!
